ngiemboon: À mÿagá legwé tá we mÿag tà tse gwoon yé.
en: He worried about his father's death so much that he became anxious.

ngiemboon: À tyě lê tsêm páʼ fʉ̀ʼ gie à ne ńguɔ la.
en: He remains calm as if he is ill.

ngiemboon: À lɔgɔ́ tsemé tÿó ńcúa kúnɔ̀ɔn.
en: He hit the pork with a piece of wood.
Don't put yourself between those people.

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ lɔɔn néŋ mekú pɔ̀ɔn, ɔ̀ shÿɔ́g metɔ̌ɔn pîɛ mɔɔn tsetsoló.
en: If you put the bean in the bag, stick the avocado inside.

ngiemboon: À ně ńjú mekèlè, ńtsɔ́ʼɔ tsétsɔgɔ́ ńná né mèŋ.
en: He bought the donuts and removed the crumbs to give to me.
